! gopm -c gopmconfig --quit-delay 0 -i gopmextra
stderr 'error:cannot read CUE path: read gopmextra: is a directory'

-- gopmconfig/config.cue --
package config

config: grpc_server: {
	network: "unix"
	address: "gopm.socket"
}

-- gopmextra/options.cue --
config: programs: sleeper: {
	command: """
		echo hello
		"""
}
